                                           /____                              
                                                                               
        Danmaku Unlimited 2 is an indie labor of love to bring classic         
        Japanese vertical shooting action to modern HD systems                 
                                                                               
        Features:                                                              
                                                                               
        Authentic Japanese arcade shooter style action.                        
        Battle countless enemies as you fight across 5 beautiful,              
        action-packed stages                                                   
        Weave and dodge against unique, exhilarating bullet patterns in epic   
        multi-phase boss battles.                                              
        Level up and outfit the powerful Senko fighter to suit your personal   
        play-style!                                                            
        Music by the talented Japanese indie group BLANKFIELD                  
        4 levels of difficulty                                                 
        Choose between 2 full-featured game modes                              
        Bonus features: Go for a challenge in the Boss Rush mode or practice   
        your skills in the Free Play mode.                                     
                                                                               
                                                                               
        URL: http://doragongames.com/danmaku2/                                 
                                                                               
                                                                               
        If you like the game, support the developers and buy it!

This is a scene Release and a 0 day application
To Extract
First select all the zip files by dragging your mouse over them. Then unzip them to a different folder. At the new folder you will find a set of rars .Do the exact same procedure as the zips but this time select the extract here option.
That should do it. If you are having trouble with the rars upgrade your winrar to version 5.
